name: Dessert Resilience: A Cactus in a Glass Boot

metadata.name: Dessert Resilience: A Cactus in a Glass Boot
metadata.description:
Within this vessel, sand and pebbles gleam,
A microcosm of life, a desert dream,
Where roots can cling and find a way to thrive,
In spite of all the odds that would contrive.
So let this cactus be a testament,
To strength and hope in any element.
